title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.19 - Public hearings on draft environmental impact statements to be combined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.19 - Public hearings on draft environmental impact statements to be combined

State Regulations

Any hearing on a draft environmental impact statement
prepared pursuant to the State Environmental Quality Review Act shall be
consolidated with any hearing held pursuant to this Part to the maximum extent
practicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
